thread.title: Watch: Dubai Police foil prisoners' dramatic escape attempt
thread.title_full: Watch: Dubai Police foil prisoners' dramatic escape attempt

title: Watch: Dubai Police foil prisoners' dramatic escape attempt
text: The dramatic attempt was captured on CCTV cameras around the station. Dubai Police arrested three prisoners trying to escape from a police station on Wednesday . According to a tweet by the force on Thursday , the prisoners tried to make a run for it - earlier this week - taking advantage of the peak hour rush at the station. They reportedly ran away from the custody of the officer in charge. - Dubai Police???? ??? (@DubaiPoliceHQ) February 2, 2017 A CCTV footage of the trio trying to escape the prison has been shared on social media. In the video, they can be seen running out of the main gate with a group of policemen and staff chasing them on the streets. According to local reports, the three African prisoners made the escape attempt as they were being escorted to their cell at the detention centre. While one of them was arrested after a brief chase, the other two were apprehended after two hours. The trio was arrested on charges of robbery in the Naif area. Share
